Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi was named Player of the Match.
Uganda was bowled out for 58 in 16 overs.
Pre-Game Insights: Uganda won the toss and elected to bowl.
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan handed Uganda a harsh initiation in their World Cup debut.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Guyana National Stadium.
Umpires for the match were Raza, A & Dharmasena, H D P K.
TV Umpire was Holdstock, A T.
Match Referee was Pycroft, A J.
